mapper.select: SELECT userId, userNo, userName, userGender, userAddr1, userAddr2, userPhone, userEmail, regdate FROM user_tb ORDER BY userNo DESC
SELECT /*+USE_HASH_AGGREGATION*/ sido_name FROM SIGUNGU_CODE GROUP BY sido_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 1 ORDER BY sido_name
SELECT sigungu_name FROM SIGUNGU_CODE WHERE sido_name = #{sido_name} ORDER BY sigungu_name

SELECT a.sido_name, a.sigungu_name, b.road_name, b.zipcode, b.building_bonbun, b.building_bubun, b.sigungu_building_name FROM SIGUNGU_CODE a RIGHT OUTER JOIN BUILDING_INFO b on a.sido_name=b.sido_name and a.sigungu_name=b.sigungu_name WHERE b.sido_name = #{param1} and b.sigungu_name = #{param2} and b.sigungu_building_name like '%${param3}%'
